Title: The Human Condition I: No Greater Love
Writer: Zenzô Matsuyama (screenplay), Masaki Kobayashi (screenplay), Jumpei Gomikawa (novel)
Actors: Tatsuya Nakadai, Michiyo Aratama, Chikage Awashima, Ineko Arima
Plot: A Japanese pacifist, unable to face the dire consequences of conscientious objection, is transformed by his attempts to compromise with the demands of war-time Japan.
